text:
After installed apache_1.3.33-win32-x86-no_src the item Control Apache Server in
Apache HTTP Server menu  does not appear. Looking for error in the error log
found "server shutdown initiated...", otherwise, in the access log there are no
entries.
Have a nice fix. Regards,
Mauricio.
creator: maudnav@hotmail.com

text: Forgot a little thing, apache 1.3.33 didn't start.
creator: maudnav@hotmail.com

text:
You control the Apache service in the Services applet within the
settings - control panel - administrative tools unless you have run
the installer to install apache 'just for current user' (in which
case there is no service, and you get a start menu item to launch
the apache server window, a rather boring command window box.)

As far as not-starting, you don't provide any information so it's
awfully hard to help.  issues.apache.org isn't a support forum, take
that issue to a peer support users list.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
